definition: to travel/to go on a tour/to roam

sentences.english: Birds soar in the sky while fishes roam in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿翱翔天空，鱼儿遨游大海。

sentences.english: I wandered lonely like a cloud.
I Childishness naive forever traveling in the blue space.
sentences.chinese: 我童稚的天真永远遨游于湛蓝的太空。

sentences.english: He depend on what income to maintain their own roaming the world?
sentences.chinese: 他靠什么收入来维持本人的遨游天下？

sentences.english: Yang Liwei is the first taikonaut to travel in space.
sentences.chinese: 杨立伟是中国第一位遨游太空的宇航员。

sentences.english: In your imagination swim freely, joyously.
sentences.chinese: 在你的脑海中快活地自由遨游。

sentences.english: Watch sea eagles glide by or do some whale spotting directly from your bed.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在床上看着海鹰飞翔天空，鲸鱼遨游水中。

sentences.english: Women astronauts have travelled in space ships already.
sentences.chinese: 女宇航员已经乘坐宇宙飞船遨游太空了。

sentences.english: If deprive the mind's opportunity of roaming, it will incur emotion disorder and out of control.
sentences.chinese: 当心遨游的机会被局限，七情六欲就会混乱而失控。

sentences.english: Who is the first astronaut that travelled in space?
sentences.chinese: 谁是第一个遨游太空的宇航员？

sentences.english: You rasie me up, to walk on the stormy seas.
sentences.chinese: 你鼓舞了我，让我遨游于大海之深。

sentences.english: Childishness naive forever traveling in the blue space.
sentences.chinese: 我童稚的天真永远遨游于湛蓝的太空。

sentences.english: But also the remotest corners of the globe as traveling, collecting Yuting appearance with.
sentences.chinese: 但也能天涯海角任遨游，怡情雨亭长相伴。

sentences.english: After this, you may stay with the nature of Tao, roaming in the broad realm of perfect freedom.
sentences.chinese: 从此与自然之道为伍，遨游于开阔的大莫之国中。

sentences.english: Imagine being able to surf the Web with the power of your thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 想象一下，用你思想的力量在网上冲浪遨游。

definition: to soar/to wheel about in the sky
to wander about unhurriedly/to linger/to loiter
to circle in the air/to soar
free and unconstrained (idiom); unfettered/unbuttoned/without care or worries
to travel back and forth/to shuttle
variant of 飄盪|飘荡[piao1 dang4]
